text: Flávio Nantes Bolsonaro ( born April 30, 1981), is a Brazilian businessman, lawyer and politician.. He is the son of the current president of Brazil Jair Bolsonaro and Rogéria Nantes Nunes Braga. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Rio de Janeiro (state) Category:Brazilian businesspeople Category:Brazilian lawyers
title: Flávio Bolsonaro
